observation: Evans & Evans, Inc.  About Us Services Team Contact Us Careers SINCE 1989 trusted financial advisory services Expert Financial Advice For over 30 years, we have leveraged our knowledge, experience, and relationships to help businesses around the world achieve their financial goals. about us At Evans & Evans, we have delivered corporate financial advice and guidance since 1989. We provide valuation reports and fairness opinions; capital formation assistance and M&A services; business due diligence and business planning; and market and competitive research to companies globally. Learn More OUR SERVICES Valuation Services Including Valuation Reports, Fairness Opinions, Fair Value for Financial Statements, Goodwill Impairment Testing, and Litigation Support. M&A Whether acting on behalf of the buyer or the seller, Evans & Evans helps companies at all stages in the merger & acquisition process. Capital Formation We combine the global reach of a large investment bank with the senior-level involvement of a boutique firm. Business Planning We work with client companies to create strategic plans, pitch decks and teasers to meet all of their business planning requirements. Due Diligence The comprehensive approach we've developed results in a detailed report which examines your situation from multiple perspectives. Sector Experience Technology & fintech Artificial Intelligence (AI) FinTech Blockchain Environmental Technologies eCommerce Internet Software & Services Consumer Electronics Cyber Security AgTech Natural Resources, Energy & Industrial Metals & Mining Automotive & Mobility Capital Goods Engineering & Construction Environmental Services Transportation Timberland & Forest Products financial services Asset Managers Banks Insurance & InsurTech Cryptocurrencies Health Sciences & Biotech Drug Discovery Healthcare Services R&D Psychedelics Medical Devices CONSUMER & RETAIL Food, Beverage & Alcohol Health & Wellness Ingredients & Food Technology Cannabis Tech-Enabled Consumer Travel & Leisure media Tech-Enabled Communications Social Media Gaming eSports Copyright © 2024. Evans & Evans, Inc.

thought: The WHOIS information shows that the domain evansevans.com has been registered since 1997 and is not set to expire until 2025. The use of a privacy service to register the domain is common practice and does not necessarily indicate a scam. The company's website text and search results confirm its existence and the services it offers, which appear to be legitimate financial advisory services. There are no immediate red flags, such as unusual payment methods or claims of free products. However, the future copyright year listed on the website could simply be an oversight and not indicative of a scam. Since there are no overt signs of a scam based on the criteria provided, I will take one final step to check for any negative reports or mentions on social media.
